alert.note: Alert for Windham (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued May 01 at 4:07AM EDT until May 01 at 11:11AM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Williams River At Rockingham. * WHEN...Until late this morning. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 3:45 AM EDT Monday the stage was 7.6 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to 8.3 feet early this morning. The river will fall below flood stage by later this morning. - Flood stage is 8.0 feet. - Flood History...This crest compares to a previous crest of 8.2 feet on 04/14/1994. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Williams River Rockingham Flood Stage: 8.0 Observed Stage at Mon 3 am: 7.6 Forecast: Mon 6 am 8.3 Mon 10 am 7.5 Mon 4 pm 6.5 Mon 10 pm 6.1 Tue 4 am 5.7 &&
